casebody.data:
No. 11-354. Earl W. Burkholder, Jr., et al., Petitioners v. International Union, United Automobile, Aerospace and Agricultural Implement Workers of America, Local No. 12, et al. 565 U.S. 1060, 132 S. Ct. 766,

181 L. Ed. 2d 485,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 8543. November 28, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 646 F.3d 360.
